column4: I am using an Ubuntu live-cd in order to retrieve files off of an NTFS hard drive so that it can be transferred to an OSX based PC.  What is the easiest and most efficient method to do this??
I would save them to a USB stick or drive then plug that into OSX
I tried that, it only shows a small section of the files on the OSX machine (100/350mb)
Oh, that's weird. Maybe format the USB drive in the OSX filesystem (if you can) cos I think Linux can use it fine
